Html:
I was just wondering if there is any progress towards making and updated version of NewTake available?

Thanks for all the hard work :)

Development on the newtake engine kindof stalled - we hit various issues with the way the basic code works and the fact that we have day jobs. We did do some development in private which is unreleased but is probably more game specific and still has a lot of problems.

Other commitments mean that we're unlikely to update this project...

The other guys are now developing XenoGalaxies which is Unity based
http://www.xenogalaxies.com/index.html

And i'm playing around with a completely separate engine written in SharpDX
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=83anqiDMM2k&feature=c4-overview&list=UURn969FLd11z8q_XEboVyCA

Thanks for the reply - no worries on the newtake engine etc. Nice work on the engine - so Sharp DX is worth looking into eh? Ive started looking for something to replace XNA ...

Ive been keeping an eye on the XenoGalaxies :) Definitely looks like its shaping up into something pretty cool


:)

Personally i love SharpDX especially the toolkit which is pretty much as easy to use as XNA, but still allows you to access the full underlying framework when you want.
If you want cross platform support i'd look at Mono, or Synapse Gamings soon to be released Sunburn 2.1
